p: In every sample of E. cyparissias extract, the antioxidant activity was evaluated by using the DPPH radical scavenging and reducing power assays as previously described in the literature [ 28, 29]. To measure DPPH activity, a sample of 0.5 mL for each concentration was mixed with an equal volume of DPPH ethanolic solution and incubated in darkness for 1 h at ambient temperature. The activity was determined by comparing the absorbance at 519 nm of DPPH radicals to that of the control (containing all reagents except the extract).
